name: Raw Materials
definition: Basic resources gathered directly from the Minecraft world without crafting

name: Basic Materials
definition: Simple processed materials crafted from raw resources

name: Intermediate Items
definition: More complex items crafted from basic materials

name: Advanced Tools
definition: Specialized tools and equipment crafted from intermediate items

name: Oak Log
definition: Wood block obtained by breaking oak trees with any tool or hand

name: Cobblestone
definition: Stone block obtained by mining stone with a pickaxe

name: Iron Ore
definition: Ore block that drops raw iron when mined and can be smelted into iron ingots

name: Coal
definition: Fuel item obtained by mining coal ore used for torches and smelting

name: Wool
definition: Block obtained from sheep used for beds and decorative items

name: Oak Planks
definition: Wooden planks crafted from one oak log producing four planks

name: Stick
definition: Crafting ingredient made from two planks placed vertically producing four sticks

name: Iron Ingot
definition: Metal ingot produced by smelting iron ore or raw iron in a furnace

name: Charcoal
definition: Fuel item created by smelting any log in a furnace used as coal substitute

name: Crafting Table
definition: 3x3 crafting grid workstation made from four planks arranged in a square

name: Wooden Planks
definition: Generic wooden building material that can be any wood type

name: Torch
definition: Light source made from one stick and one coal or charcoal

name: Wooden Tools
definition: Basic tool tier crafted from sticks and planks with low durability

name: Wooden Pickaxe
definition: Tool for mining stone and coal made from three planks and two sticks

name: Wooden Sword
definition: Weapon for combat made from two planks and one stick

name: Wooden Axe
definition: Tool for chopping wood faster made from three planks and two sticks

name: Iron Tools
definition: Durable tool tier crafted from iron ingots and sticks

name: Iron Armor
definition: Protective equipment crafted from iron ingots

name: Iron Pickaxe
definition: Mining tool made from three iron ingots and two sticks that mines diamonds

name: Iron Sword
definition: Combat weapon made from two iron ingots and one stick with good damage

name: Iron Axe
definition: Chopping tool made from three iron ingots and two sticks

name: Iron Helmet
definition: Head protection crafted from five iron ingots

name: Iron Chestplate
definition: Torso protection crafted from eight iron ingots

name: Chest
definition: Storage container made from eight planks holding 27 item stacks

name: Furnace
definition: Smelting station crafted from eight cobblestone blocks

name: Bed
definition: Spawn point setter made from three wool and three planks

name: Diamond Pickaxe
definition: Top-tier mining tool made from three diamonds and two sticks

name: Enchanting Table
definition: Magic station made from obsidian diamonds and book for enchanting items

name: Anvil
definition: Tool repair and naming station made from iron blocks and iron ingots
